channel.title: Nulls in Shops
channel.description:
I am using a Zenithscape source, and whenever I try adding auras or goliath gloves to the donator shop i made, it says there are "none available" with not price. Even though it says 100 are left. How do i fix this?
My skype is: tim3626719 - add me if u can help or just post it here, thanks

item.title: Nulls in Shops
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“CPUsquad, post:3, topic:460081”][quote author=ohokay link=topic=562994.msg4104068#msg4104068 date=1347804351]
The items don’t exist server side?
[/quote]

okay u sir… are a moron… (FACEPALM)

look in shops.java… it has to do with loyalty points im guessing cause thats how i have it… browse thru shops.java for the item id xP[/quote]

So the item being ‘null’ has to do with loyalty points? Erm?

Read full topic
